text:
Ajit Pramod Kumar Jogi (29 April 1946 29 May 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Janta Congress Chhattisgarh (INC) political party. He was born in present-day Chhattisgarh, India.
Jogi was a member of Parliament of India from 1998 to 1999 and again from 2004 to 2008. He was the first Chief Minister of Chhattisgarh from 2000 to 2003.
Jogi died of cardiac arrest after choking on food on 29 May 2020 in Raipur, India at the age of 74.
